text.tspan: Executive Prouducer | Neostream | Little Deveil Inside
Art Director | Giant Sparrow | The Unfinished Swan
Art Director | Riot Games | The League of Legends
Art Director | Hinterland | The Long Dark
Lighting Director | Sucker Punch | Sly Cooper series
We only have the most talented people in the house.
Tidal Flats is a Web3 creative studio that focuses on professional NFT game development, community building, and overall operations.
Our mission is to take the concept of a Web3 creative studio to the next level and leverage the power of the NFT pfp community to increase
brand awareness and create a unique gaming ecosystem. We distinguish ourselves from other NFT projects by bringing a level of
professionalism from the Web2 environment into the Web3 space.
Tidal Flats: Evolvement of the Contents Building Eco-system
Our vision for Tidal Flats is to create a strong IP product with strong
value on the pfp side and enjoyable gameplay on the P2E side.
By combining two different sectors within the blockchain industry
under a single IP, we aim to create a complementary relationship
that supports and enhances the value of both.
